definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: The down escalator is not running today.
sentences.chinese: 今天下行的自動樓梯不開。

sentences.english: You see the escalator over there?
sentences.chinese: 你看見那邊的自動樓梯了嗎？

sentences.english: Take the escalator and then go to the right.
sentences.chinese: 乘自動樓梯下去，然後往右拐。
